title: Hop seed

properties.name: description
properties.value: Hop seeds are used to grow hops in hops patches in the Farming skill, or placed in a Bird House in the Hunter Skill. The hops harvested can be used to make different types of beers and ales in Cooking. They are planted in a hops patch by using four hop seeds (or three for jute seed). Hops should be watered frequently with a watering can until fully grown.

content:
Hop seeds are used to grow hops in hops patches in the Farming skill, or placed in a Bird House in the Hunter Skill. The hops harvested can be used to make different types of beers and ales in Cooking. They are planted in a hops patch by using four hop seeds (or three for jute seed). Hops should be watered frequently with a watering can until fully grown.

Harvests vary between 3 and 46 hops and is done with a spade in the player's inventory. After a patch has been harvested, it is cleared for re-planting. Hops are susceptible to disease which will always kill crops unless cured.

Hop seeds are also used in Hunter training in birdhouses. 10 seeds can go in each birdhouse with the exception of Wildblood seeds which will only take 5.

List of hop seeds[edit | edit source]

  2. ↑ Assume 10 hops are harvested
  3. ↑ 3.0 3.1 All sacks required must be filled with 10 harvests.
  4. ↑ Each basket must be filled with 5 harvests.

rawContent:
'''Hop seeds''' are used to grow [[hops]] in [[hops patch]]es in the [[Farming]] skill, or placed in a [[Bird House Traps|Bird House]] in the [[Hunter]] Skill. The hops harvested can be used to make different types of [[beer]]s and [[ale]]s in [[Cooking]]. They are planted in a [[hops patch]] by using '''four''' hop seeds (or '''three''' for [[jute seed]]). Hops should be watered frequently with a [[watering can]] until fully grown. Harvests vary between 3 and 46 [[hops]] and is done with a [[spade]] in the player's inventory. After a patch has been harvested, it is cleared for re-planting. Hops are susceptible to [[Disease (Farming)|disease]] which will always kill crops unless cured.
